meanings.definition: A period of one hundred years.
meanings.sent1: In the last centu, many technological advancements were made.
meanings.sent2: The tree in the park has been standing for over a centu.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if dinosaurs lived in the same centu as humans.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom seemed to span more than a centu.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins have been preserved for centuries, each centu telling a different story.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency equal to one hundredth of a dollar.
meanings.sent1: She saved up every centu to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepted coins in multiples of a centu.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his piggy bank was overflowing with centus.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were worth more than a centu to him.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's cup jingled with the sound of centus from generous passersby.

meanings.definition: A Roman military unit consisting of one hundred soldiers.
meanings.sent1: The centu marched in perfect formation on the battlefield.
meanings.sent2: The centu was known for its discipline and strength.
meanings.sent3: The centu's commander joked that they were 'a hundred soldiers strong and a hundred times braver.'
meanings.sent4: Their unity in battle made them a centu to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The centu's shields formed an impenetrable wall, each soldier a vital piece of the whole.
